projects.title: Button Counter
projects.summary: Increment a label when button is pressed.

steps.title: Node script
steps.code:
extends Node
var n := 0
func _ready():
  $Button.pressed.connect(_on_pressed)
func _on_pressed():
  n += 1
  $Label.text = str(n)
